[/quote]

Why don’t you go fuck yourself lil’ man? Couldn’t you just have said “Yeah, in the tut section.”? No, you had to be an impatient asshole, you didn’t need to flame him/her.

Dose anyone know and servers that have construction or PC in it if you do can you tell me the name of the server or the download link please

There’s a tutorial on adding Pest Control in the tutorial section, you need the 377 client for it though, the link for it is provided in that thread. Construction is in the Fr33sc4p3 source, it’s not 100% like RuneScape though.[/quote]
he cudda just taken a quick browse through the forum and found the tut section or maybe even the search button either or…

DeathStrike:

Dose anyone know and servers that have construction or PC in it if you do can you tell me the name of the server or the download link please

There’s a tutorial on adding Pest Control in the tutorial section, you need the 377 client for it though, the link for it is provided in that thread. Construction is in the Fr33sc4p3 source, it’s not 100% like RuneScape though.
